text: Vece Paes is a former Indian hockey midfielder, and representing the Indian team in the 1972 Munich Olympics, that won the bronze medal. He is the father of India's tennis player Leander Paes. He is also a doctor in sports medicine. He attended La Martiniere College in Lucknow.La Martiniere College alumni meet The Tribune 8 November 2002, Chandigarh, India accessed July 2007 He is married to Jennifer Dutton, a great granddaughter of Michael Madhusudan Dutt, a famous Bengali poet. ==References== Category:Presidency University, Kolkata alumni Category:Olympic field hockey players of India Category:Field hockey players at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:University of Calcutta alumni Category:La Martinière College, Lucknow alumni Category:Indian Roman Catholics Category:Field hockey players from Goa Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Medalists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for India
title: Vece Paes
